name: Any-Spirit Negroni
description: This take on the classic drink uses a combination of sweet and dry vermouths in the standard gin-vermouth-red bitter formula, adding depth and character. The vermouths are paired with the spirit of your choice for an adaptable drink that puts whatever bottles you prefer or have on hand to work. If you're not a fan of the traditional gin, rum, tequila or bourbon or rye whiskeys are all great here.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce spirit of your choice (gin, rum, tequila or bourbon or rye whiskeys all work)
1 ounce red bitter liqueur, such as Campari, Cappelletti or Contratto Bitter
1 (2-inch-long) piece of orange or lemon peel, for serving

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice, and add the spirit, red bitter, sweet vermouth and dry vermouth. Stir for 30 seconds, then strain into an ice-filled lowball glass. Garnish with the citrus peel.
